formatDescription: The Interoperable Master Format (IMF) is a file-based media format, and an IMF Package is a collection of media files with accompanying XML data describing the IMF Package structure. The Composition Playlist (CPL) in an XML file that describes how media components are assembled on a timeline for specific content representations. A CPL file should be found alongside other IMP component files.

internalSignatures.name: IMF Package Composition Playlist
internalSignatures.note: XML declaration, followed by <CompositionPlaylist opening tag, shortly followed by a reference to http://www.smpte-ra.org, included here to avoid any incidental clashes with non-IMF formats using similar tags. Note that this signature doesn’t currently utilize any specific XML Namespace element for CPL, although this could be included if there is a requirement to distinguish between different schema compliance.

supportedBy.name: SMPTE / Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers

developedBy.name: SMPTE / Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers
